com.risk.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a player it maintains id and name of the player also it has different methods to change the status of the object
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Kourosh Aziz-Nejad
